metadata.description: Empirical constraints on gravitational coupling modifications from lab experiments
metadata.sources: Literature review of torsion balance tests, superconductor gravity experiments, BEC precision measurements

constraints.notes: Best limit on composition-dependent forces at mm-cm scales. Does not involve coherent matter.
Silica test masses in vacuum. High-Q pendulum mode. No coherent quantum systems involved.

constraints.test_type: Gravity shielding above rotating YBCO disk
constraints.notes: Claimed 0.5-2% weight reduction above spinning YBCO disk at 77K. Never independently verified. Controversial.
Failed to reproduce Podkletnov effect. Upper limit ~10 ppm on any gravity modification near rotating superconductor.
Rb-87 BEC as test mass. Measures local g to 7 ppb. No test of BEC gravitational coupling to external masses.
Measured electromagnetic Casimir-Polder force. No search for gravitational modifications.
YBCO disk at 77K placed near torsion balance test mass. No anomalous torque detected above 30 ppm.
BEC maintains coherence for ~2s with xi ~ 0.5 micron. No gravitational coupling test, but establishes coherent state achievability.
Neutron matter waves coherent over mm scales. Phase shift consistent with standard gravity. No sign of coherence-modified coupling.

recommended_tests.motivation: Direct test of theory: replace one Cavendish source mass with coherent YBCO at 77K. Measure torque change.
recommended_tests.predicted_signal: ΔG/G ~ -0.5 to +6 (theory predicts +640% for ξ=100, centered geometry)
recommended_tests.feasibility: HIGH - commercial torsion balance + liquid N2 cryostat

recommended_tests.test_name: BEC gravimeter with external coherent mass
recommended_tests.motivation: Use BEC atom interferometer to measure local g with/without nearby coherent system (superconductor or second BEC).
recommended_tests.feasibility: MEDIUM - requires specialized atom interferometer facility

recommended_tests.motivation: Split BEC wavefunction, pass through region with/without coherent mass nearby. Measure phase shift.
recommended_tests.predicted_signal: Δφ ~ ℏ⁻¹ ∫ (G - G_eff) m dr (dimensionless phase)
recommended_tests.feasibility: LOW - requires BEC splitting + coherent mass insertion + stable phase readout
